title: Rotate log files
hints: Use the find command with the -size option to locate files larger than a certain size. Remember that +15k means strictly greater than 15 KB.
The tar command can create an archive from a list of files. Consider combining find with tar using xargs or the -T option.
After archiving, make sure to remove or move the original files from the logs/ directory so that none of the rotated files remain there.
